meanings.definition: Strongest or most robust in body or build.
meanings.sent1: The lion was the stoutest animal in the jungle.
meanings.sent2: The oak tree stood as the stoutest in the forest.
meanings.sent3: The stoutest wrestler in town always won the matches.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was the stoutest shield against adversity.
meanings.sent5: The fortress walls were the stoutest defense against invaders.

meanings.definition: Most determined or resolute in character.
meanings.sent1: She showed the stoutest courage in facing her fears.
meanings.sent2: The knight's stoutest resolve never wavered in battle.
meanings.sent3: Even in the face of failure, his stoutest spirit never faltered.
meanings.sent4: Her stoutest belief in justice guided all her actions.
meanings.sent5: The captain's stoutest leadership inspired the crew to victory.

meanings.definition: Most substantial or thick in consistency.
meanings.sent1: The stew had the stoutest flavor, rich and savory.
meanings.sent2: The bread was the stoutest she had ever tasted, dense and satisfying.
meanings.sent3: The stoutest gravy she made was always a hit at family dinners.
meanings.sent4: The walls of the ancient castle were the stoutest, built to withstand time.
meanings.sent5: The rope was the stoutest, able to hold the weight of a car without breaking.
